EmailTemplate.subject: An exciting opportunity for your child: take action today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Presents: Step Forward
Dear {!Contact.Parent_Name__c},
Step Forward, brought to you by The Challenge, gives your child the opportunity to stand out from the crowd in today’s tough economic climate. {!Contact.FirstName} can apply now in order to be considered for our next assessment events in early December!
www.stepforward.uk.com
"I love Step Forward because I get the scope to learn new skills which aids my personal growth and development" - Step Forward Associate
Remind me again, what is Step Forward?
Step Forward is a London based 12 month programme for school and college leavers. Whether they plan to go to university, straight into the world of work or are still making their decision, it gives young people the skills required to succeed in their future career.
Young people who are accepted onto Step Forward gain:
Invaluable experience with quality employers Comprehensive personal and professional development training and a nationally recognised qualification The advice and support of a trained mentor £9000 paid salary
What next?
You can now secure your son / daughter’s future today by registering interest in Step Forward on their behalf. Please ensure that you input child’s details first followed by your own.
www.stepforward.uk.com
In order to be considered for our next assessment events on Saturday 5th and 12th December we must receive an application from your child by Sunday 29th November. Places are limited and will be assigned on a first come, first served basis.
Register interest on your child’s behalf and take the first step to ensuring that they get ahead.
"We value highly the transferable and personal skills developed on programmes such as Step Forward " - Partner at Hogan Lovells, International Law Firm
Best wishes,
Step Forward
www.stepforward.uk.com
